:::Torca/Sky Lynx/Ratchet/Sideswipe/Orion:::

::Torca flips away form the grenade and fired another 25 rapid fire plasma 
blasts.  Sky Lynx got hit in the cargo bay, but his armor only gets slightly 
charred.  the ion disks damage his wings a bit.  the energy seeking missle 
hits him even more in the wings.  He fired 2 missles from one of his guns at 
Pyro, and 1 missles from his second gun at Manterror, and 1 missle from his 
second gun at where he thoguht Double Punch was.  Ratchet transformed to 
beast mode, where his armor takes the force of the blow, but a couple of 
shells penetrate his tough skin.  The purple blasts hit him in the legs, 
blowing of some of his toes.  he flaps open his ears, revealing blasters.  he 
fires 15 shots from one of them at Scavenger, and 15 shots from the other at 
Sixshot.  Sideswipe transforms to car mode and gets hit by 1 stinger missle 
and a couple of shots.  he tranformed back to robot mode and fired 1 missle 
and 12 shots at Injector::
Sideswipe: I'm gonna keep messing with you!
::Sideswipe jumps away from all but 2 of Bumblebee's stinger missles and gets 
hit by all of the optic blasts. He fires 1 missle and 13 shots at Bumblebee.  
Orion gets hit with the missle::
Orion: AHHHHH!
::This was the first time he had ever been attacked during war.  he quickly 
retaliated and fired 2 missles at where he thoght Double Punch was.

--part1_87.4721908.276f7191_boundary
